column3: My 3 favourite trappist breweries. I have visited Orval, wonderful ambience. Certainly gets cold in the Ardennes in winter.Rochefort is my favourite, the 8 and 10 are superb beers. Chimay also.
Where can I get the route? Sadly its not possible to get it at rapaha :-(
Why haven't I seen this film before?
Can someone tall me where are these monastic breweries? Name? Location?
This video of kooks talking about passion lol - great work, hipsters
Who the heck brought a Chrysler Cordoba to Belgium?
Ampleforth Ale - UKs own version - one is enough
Great story! And also a great reason to go riding.
Amazing Video, what brand are orange bike?
Bikes and beers, whats not to like? Next year i`m doing a whisky tour by bike in the Scottish highlands, wild camping/bivvy... cant wait.
Drink 1?!  Thats in insult to Orval :p
This film highlights the experience with others in a way that a race or performance only atmosphere cannot. Great clip.
what a beautiful film, like all Rapha films...
Who doesn't want a Belgian brew after this? Its only 10:30am and I am at work, don't think anyone will notice
